description: Tensorflow Implementation of Deep Learning Approach for News Summarization Task via Sequence-to-sequence Model with Pointer
Tensorflow Implementation of Deep Learning Approach for Event Extraction(ACE 2005) via Dynamic Multi-Pooling Convolutional Neural Networks
Automatic tension detection, based on the linguistic features revealed in the target document.

This repository is for the task of context-dependent-evidence-detection (CDED), which was initially introduced by <Rinott, Ruty, et al. "Show me your evidence-an automatic method for context dependent evidence detection." EMNLP 2015.>
The codes, targeting a task: SemEval 2018 Task12, the argument reasoning comprehension task.
